thread.title: First Time at This Hotel, we will be back
thread.title_full: First Time at This Hotel, we will be back - Review of Ibis Styles London Southwark Rose, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Keith T
title: First Time at This Hotel, we will be back
text:
Stayed for 2 nights over a weekend to celebrate Son's birthday. Great room, very clean, comfy and unusually decorated. Only downside was front facing and a little noisy for us country bumpkins. Not bad sleep though, mainly due to very comfy bed. Breakfast adequate but not great. Would have liked better choice of fresh fruit and a better selection of cold meat, some of which ran out long before the end of breakfast service.
Staff very good and pleasant, very helpful.
Location perfect, we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go and so close to the south bank. Loads of facilities and restaurants nearby, including Borough Market.
Will most certainly be back soon.
